page.title: 15THE INDUSTRIAL SITE (CONTD.)
page.content: One of the biggest factories on the North Road Industrial Estate is {McVitties}which makes cakes and biscuits. It used to be called Watts Countrymade Foods or the 'pie factory' but it has been taken over by McVitties. Another factory is{Remco}which is owned by R.L. Day. It has been there about two years and they do electrical instalments. {National Tyre Services}sell Dunlop tyres and also put new remoulds on your tyres. In that factory before them was a firm called Hales Cakes. {Lowfields,}another firm, transport food and they have been there for over ten years. {Initial Towel and Linen}have been in the same factory for over five years and they have made changes inside their building. {
